Bob-
	Tantalizing little piece, would love to know your source. Especially 
the bit about the swords. Satsuma "rebellion" swords are often seen and 
dismissed for their low quality. I had however never heard that they 
were from the arsenal at Kagoshima, which would add a delicious new 
wrinkle to the story...
-t
